info.title: Azure Monitor Operations API
info.description: Lists all of the possible operations available for the Azure Monitor resource provider.

get.description: Lists all of the available operations from Microsoft.Insights provider.

OperationListResult.description: A list of REST API operations supported by the Microsoft.Insights Azure Resource Provider. It contains an URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of operations supported by the Microsoft.Insights provider.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results (if there are any).

Operation.title: REST API Operation
Operation.description: Details of a REST API operation, returned from the Microsoft.Insights Operations API

name.description: The name of the operation, as per Resource-Based Access Control (RBAC). Examples: "Microsoft.Insights/components/write", "Microsoft.Insights/metrics/read"

isDataAction.description: Whether the operation applies to data-plane. This is "true" for data-plane operations and "false" for ARM/control-plane operations.

display.description: Localized display information for this particular operation.

provider.description: The localized friendly form of the resource provider name, e.g. "Microsoft Azure Monitor".

resource.description: The localized friendly name of the resource type related to this operation. E.g. "Application insights components" or "Log Definitions".

operation.description: The concise, localized friendly name for the operation; suitable for dropdowns. E.g. "Reading an application insights component configuration", "Application Insights component metrics read".

description.description: The short, localized friendly description of the operation; suitable for tool tips and detailed views.

origin.description: The intended executor of the operation; as in Resource Based Access Control (RBAC) and audit logs UX. Default value is "user,system"

actionType.description: Enum. Indicates the action type. "Internal" refers to actions that are for internal only APIs.

properties.description: Properties of operation, include log and metric specifications.

OperationProperties.description: Properties of operation, include metric specifications.

serviceSpecification.description: One property of operation, include metric specifications.

ServiceSpecification.description: One property of operation, include log specifications.

legacyMetricSpecifications.description: Legacy Metric specifications for operation. Deprecated, do not use.

unit.description: The metric unit. Possible values include: Count,Bytes,Seconds,Percent,CountPerSecond,BytesPerSecond,MilliSeconds,ByteSeconds,Unspecified,BitsPerSecond,Cores,MilliCores,NanoCores

aggregationType.description: The default metric aggregation type. Possible values include: Total,Average,Maximum,Minimum,Count

supportedAggregationTypes.description: The supported aggregation types for the metrics.

supportedTimeGrainTypes.description: The supported time grain types for the metrics.

availabilities.description: The supported time grain types for the metrics.

fillGapWithZero.description: Property to specify whether to fill empty gaps with zero.

DimensionProperties.description: Type of operation: get, read, delete, etc.

isHidden.description: When set, the dimension is hidden from the customer, used in conjunction with the defaultDimensionValues field below

defaultDimensionValues.description: Default dimension value to be sent down for the hidden dimension during query
